headline: Technical Perspective: Model Structure Takes Guesswork Out of State Estimation
description: <p>&quot;Worst-Case Topological Entropy and Minimal Data Rate for State Estimation of Switched Linear Systems&quot; gives a method for computing the topological entropy of a broad class of systems called switched linear systems.</p>
headline_zh-Hans: 技术视角。模型结构使状态估计不再是猜测的工作
headline_zh-Hant: 技術視角。模型結構使狀態估計不再是猜測的工作
description_zh-Hans: <p>&quot;Worst-Case Topological Entropy and Minimal Data Rate for State Estimation of Switched Linear Systems&quot;给出了一种计算被称为交换式线性系统的一大类系统的拓扑熵的方法</p&gt。
description_zh-Hant: <p>&quot;Worst-Case Topological Entropy and Minimal Data Rate for State Estimation of Switched Linear Systems&quot;給出了一種計算被稱為交換式線性系統的一大類系統的拓撲熵的方法</p&gt。
